titles.title: A joint resolution supporting a base Defense Budget that at the very minimum matches 4 percent of gross domestic product.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
12/7/2007--Introduced.
Declares that it is U.S. policy to commit a minimum of 4% of the nation's gross domestic product to the base defense budget in order to meet the fundamental national security requirements of the United States.
